author: freyja_accuser_of_iomedae
content: if you have a large smart contract that you want to submit to ETH, is it possible for the gas fees to cost tens of thousands in USD fees? I am watching a project and the dev is saying they can't submit contract to the Eth blockchain as fee estimate is 10's of thousands in USD

author: sky.cactus
content: The biggest contract you can deploy is something like 8M gas IIRC.  At 500 nanoeth per gas that is like 4 ETH.  It isn't 10s of thousands, but it is a lot.

author: freyja_accuser_of_iomedae
content: hmmm they said it was also failing. that they attempted at least a few times. anyways, it ended up deploying later on a new attempt. strange.
